body.p: Starting with version 23, includes support for some DITA 2.0 features. In the application Preferences->DITA page you can select the Enable DITA 2.0 Editing Support (Experimental) checkbox to enable them.

The following table is a list of DITA 2.0 features and their implementation status in : DITA 2.0 Features Implementation Status
Feature Editing Publishing [DITA Open Toolkit is used]
DITA 2.0 DTD, and Relax NG-based maps/topics/tasks/references, etc.
New DITA 2.0 document templates.
Supported also by publishing engine.
Other new DITA 2.0 elements (include, etc)
Validation and Content Completion
Special rendering in PDF and XHTML-based outputs:
Profiling attributes defined using the new specializations attribute. Profiling attributes defined using the new specializations attribute are recognized by the application. Supported also by publishing engine.
